General.Name: Arizona Lithium Ltd
General.Description: Arizona Lithium Limited operates as a mineral exploration company in the United States. It focuses on the Big Sandy lithium project located in Arizona; and the Lordsburg lithium project situated in New Mexico. The company was formerly known as Hawkstone Mining Limited and changed its name to Arizona Lithium Limited in September 2021. Arizona Lithium Limited was incorporated in 1969 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 10 Outram Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
